Articles.Content:
Technically false, My first account succumbed to the purge and so I created a new one.

The user below me has never witnessed Overgrowth (game)

Does watching youtube videos of it count? If not, then true.

The person below me watches Markiplier's videos.

Nope I have absolute no idea who he is until now.

User below me has wonder what is the past tense of read.

Read.

The person below me had pizza for dinner

Nope.Had some toast with butter ,and some water.

use below is very bored.

Yes, quite.

The user below me is tabbed out of KSP

Not at the moment xD.

The user below me has not watched Gravity.

True, but don't attack me yet! I'm gonna get round to watching it.

The user below me is in the GMT time zone.

False, I live in EST. (No, not in NYC )

The Person below me plays a 2D sidescroller game.

uh true occasionally

the user below me plays command and conquer

No. But I play Emperor: Battle for Dune, made by the same group.

The user below is a paradox.

I am.. or am I not?

The next user to post hates "the user below me" because they to have changed their setting to show newest posts first.

False.

The user below me likes racist jokes, but isn't really racist.

Edited February 25, 2014 by xrayfishx
Oh god, I forgot Godwin's law...

False , I am racist but politically correct enough not to use racism

The user below me has never had liquorice flavoured ice cream

False. I pursue all manner of weird flavours of ice cream. (Cinnamon and rum-flavoured ice cream, anyone? Yeah, it's pretty awful.)

The user below knows not.

True, I know not.

The user below me watches Danny2462.

False. What is das?

the user below me has a wig?

False. (Danny2462 is this)

The user below me is non-British.

true as i've never been to Britain

the user below me is a doctor who fan

True, I love Doctor who!

The user below me is a railway enthusiast.

False, though I'm from the same area as the inventor of the train and have a family member with the same name as him... Hmm...

Anyway, the user below me is a regular viewer of Youtube videos.

True.

The user below me don't know who is Daniel Hardcastle.

True

The user below me know who is John de Lancie.

True. Also, Daniel Hardcastle is the essence of funny stuff, look: "I do want to point out I have literally no idea how a car goes,

beyond explodes dinosaurs and that somehow propels it forwards." - Daniel Hardcastle(AKA NerdÃ‚Â³, google it!)
